Smart Clothes Iron: A clothes iron with a built-in AI assistant that can detect the type of fabric being ironed and adjust the heat and steam settings accordingly. It can also automatically detect when the fabric is wrinkled and suggest the best ironing technique for that particular garment.

Portable Clothes Iron: A clothes iron that is small and portable, making it easy to take with you on the go. It would be perfect for people who travel frequently or for those who live in small spaces and don't have a lot of storage room for a traditional iron.

Automatic Clothes Iron: A clothes iron that can automatically detect when a garment is wrinkled and start ironing it without any manual input from the user. It would be perfect for busy people who don't have time to iron their clothes but still want to look professional.

Clothes Iron with Built-in Steamer: A clothes iron that has a built-in steamer, allowing users to both iron and steam their clothes in one device. This would be especially useful for people who have a lot of delicate fabrics that require both heat and steam to remove wrinkles.

Virtual Clothes Iron: A virtual clothes iron that uses augmented reality technology to project an image of a wrinkle-free garment onto a flat surface. Users can then use their hands to manipulate the image and smooth out the wrinkles, creating a wrinkle-free garment without the need for an actual iron. This would be perfect for people who are looking for a more interactive and immersive ironing experience.
